author: njomu
title: Bianca Gascoigne kisses Jamie O’Hara while Jessica Cunnginham flashes her underwear at wild Celebrity Big Brother afterparty
text:
TV Magazine REUNITED Bianca Gascoigne kisses Jamie O’Hara while Jessica Cunnginham flashes her underwear at wild Celebrity Big Brother afterparty 
The housemates took the opportunity to celebrate after Coleen Nolan was crowned the winner BY NOLA OJOMU, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 4th February 2017, 8:21 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THE Celebrity Big Brother contestants were in the mood to celebrate as they partied together after Coleen Nolan was crowned the winner of the dramatic series. 
All eyes were on lovebirds Bianca Gascoigne and Jamie O’Hara as they shared a tender embrace when they finally reunited outside The Village Hotel in London. souniopics@mac.com 3 All eyes were on lovebirds Bianca Gascoigne and Jamie O’Hara as they shared a tender embrace when they finally reunited outside The Village Hotel in London 
The pair made headlines with their budding romance and Bianca was visibly thrilled to see her love interest at the event after insisting to Emma Willis that their relationship was the real deal. 
However, someone who may not be happy to see the pictures of the pair’s reunion is Bianca’s former boyfriend CJ Meeks . 
Meanwhile former housemate Jessica Cunningham ended up revealing more than she bargained for as she flashed her underwear at onlookers when she was playfully lifted up by a male friend. 
The Apprentice star seemed unaware of the error as she smiled and waves at photographers as she was carried away from the festivities. souniopics@mac.com Bianca was quick to pull Jamie in for a hug as he arrived at the Celebrity Big Brother afterparty Fame Flynet Jessica Cunningham ended up revealing more than she bargained for as she flashed her underwear at onlookers
